content:
This code chunk appears to be the initial import statements and docstring for a wxPython-based GUI component that manages curve animations. It sits near the top of the file, setting up the core imports (wx for GUI) and access to object-related constants (OG). The comment explains the module's purpose as handling the curve animation interface.

The chunk is situated at the beginning of the document, before the CurveAnimFrame class definition, establishing the module's intent and dependencies upfront.

"""

from . import ObjectGlobals as OG
